attributes.action: endorse a minimum wage for foreign workers employed by British Companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For example take a minimum wage of £3.70per hour in the Uk for young persons. Now calculate 10% of that. The answer is 37pence per hour.  Is that too much to ask UK Retailers such as Tesco,Sainsbury,Primark etc to pay their overseas workers? Its at least a benchmark. A minimum start in recognition of the huge benefits we the UK consumers have come to enjoy over this decade.

rejection.details: You should not name specificcommercial organisations in your petition. This is potentially libellous.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
